content: regift me wine cozy by jennifer owens a perfect last-minute gift that can be created in just a few short hours this wine cozy is the gift that keeps on giving a regifting gem but if you don t want to part with the one you made or received this also makes a wonderful cozy for a wine bottle flower vase sizes one size to fit one standard bottle of wine or spirits measurements 9 / 23 cm circumference 10 / 25 5 cm height yarn approximately 80 - 100 yds of bulky or super bulky yarn white sample was made with 90 yds of cascade 128 superwash bulky in color 817 white red sample was made with 81 yds of plymouth yarn haciendo super bulky in color 118 red gauge 14 sts 20 row = 4 / 10 cm in st st on larger needle 18 sts = 4 / 10 cm in cable stitch pattern on larger needle needles us 8 5mm and 10 6 mm long circular needle for magic loop method or set of double pointed needle or size needed to obtain gauge two double pointed needles for making the i cord notions cable needle stitch marker page 1 of 3 regift me wind cozy © 2025 jennifer owens for personal use only pattern support -
